Requests for Documents About Z80 Family

Purpose of this sub page is to list documents which would be nice to have for integration to the Z80 Support Page, rsp. for its further development.
If one knows a document matching any of the items mentioned below, please tell me, point me to it, or even eMail it to me immediately.
If you feel attracted to create such a document (or any other which is somewhat related to Z80 Family) herself/himself, let me know before you start, just to prevent double work, or to arrange co-operations.

  • Pinouts of some Z80 Family ICs not yet covered.
  • Complete List (or Table) of known members Z80 Family EVER available with original IC's labels as used by manufacturers, favourably showing features, package info, production status, etc. in brief.
    • uP/uC of family
      e.g. Z80 ... Z380, TMPZ84xxx, HD6418x, etc.
      equivalent devices grouped together (note: NEC D780C = Z80 CPU)
    • uP/uC of close relatives
      e.g. 8080, 8085, NSC800, TLC90, etc.
    • assigned peripheral controllers
      e.g. 8420 .. 8490
    • popular, easily adaptable peripheral controllers
      e.g. 8251, 8255, 85xx
  • List (or Table) of popular Bus Standards
    used for Z80 Family uP/uC based systems
  • List (or Table) of popular Operating Systems
    used for Z80 Family up/uC based systems
  • List (or Table) of popular Computers/Products
    based on Z80 Family uP/uC
  • List of Magazines dealing with Z80
